OOC: One would think a council member would actually pay more 
attention to the RPG than this.  As has been stated several times 
already, there are TWO groups of artifacts.  The cubes found aboard 
the Pred ship - and subsequently scattered to several places, 
including Tripred HQ - were parts of a drive core belonging to a race 
at war with the Vok.

The Soul Orbs were here since Primus-knows-when, and belong to the Vok 
themselves.  (Attention, Meteara!)  Empath's discovery of one has 
activated the other two on-planet, and potentially attracted more from 
the depths of space.  Each Orb contains the souls of up to a thousand 
Vok, hence the name.

If it's still not clicking, maybe we need a new mod.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Huh... Weren't the things that fell down the sky the actual 
> artifacts? Can anyone tell me? =|
